name: App-Store
summary: A modern mobile app store web application with category filtering, detailed app pages, and responsive design.
description: A React-based mobile app store showcasing category-wise app listings with detailed pages. Built to practice component-based architecture and client-side routing.
features: Detailed app pages with images and descriptions
Fully responsive design using Tailwind CSS
challenges: Designing a consistent and intuitive UI for multiple categories
Managing dynamic routes with React Router for detail pages
futurePlans: Integrate real backend API for dynamic data

name: Gardening-Community
summary: A social platform for gardening enthusiasts to connect, share tips, and build community.
description: A community-focused web app for gardeners to register, post, comment, and connect. Uses Firebase for authentication and Firestore for real-time data.
features: User registration and login with Firebase Auth
Community feed with real-time updates and comments
challenges: Implementing secure user authentication with Firebase
Structuring Firestore data for posts and comments
Ensuring real-time UI updates with Firestore listeners
futurePlans: Add user profiles with avatars and bios
Moderation tools for spam or abuse control

name: RestoEase
summary: A full-stack restaurant management system with user ordering, admin dashboard, and secure authentication.
description: A production-ready restaurant management system where users can browse menus, place orders, and admins can manage foods, orders, and users securely.
features: Admin dashboard for managing foods, orders, and users
Firebase Authentication with JWT-based backend protection
MongoDB for persistent order and user data
challenges: Building an intuitive admin dashboard with role-based access
Integrating Firebase Auth with a Node/Express backend
futurePlans: Add order status notifications via email
Improve UI/UX for both admin and customer dashboards
